users.title: Users
users.desc: Display all information.You can maintain user information and assign roles.

admin.title: The administrator has the following permissions:
admin.desc1: 1.Manage organizations and users in system settings.
admin.desc2: 2.Have the highest privileges in other apps, possessing access to all data and the ability to perform all functionality operations.

normal.title: Normal users have the following permissions:
normal.desc2: 2. In other apps, have data access rights only for their own organization.
normal.desc3: 3. In other apps, have only operational permissions for using pages, with management pages having view-only access.

groups.title: Groups
groups.desc: Display all information.You can maintain user information and assign roles.
